overview: In a short time amarrai cabell has taken over the underground he teams up with up and coming actor Cosmin Andrei and well  known Hollywood producer/actor David banks one of the executive producers of hit HBO max show insecure 6 Months of November is about a man who is depressed and trying to get over a breakup but stuck in a time loop. The man is the only character in the film
title: 6 Months of November
